programme.title: Space Channel Movie : Robinson Crusoe on Mars
programme.desc: Commander Kit Draper is forced to crash-land on Mars when his mission goes horribly wrong. He must figure out how to find oxygen, water, and food on the lifeless planet. Duration: 9000

programme.title: Space Channel Movie- Astronaut: The Last Push
programme.desc: A tragic accident cuts short the first manned mission to explore life on the moons of Jupiter, Michael Forrest must make the 3 year journey home to Earth in pure solitude. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel Movies: Without Warning
programme.desc: Sandy and Greg are teenagers who go camping, despite warnings not to, with their friends. They soon encounter aliens, who are using the area as a hunting ground. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel Universe- all around our social space.
programme.desc: Join us alongside Sabree Edwards for a trip around the Space Channel Universe, bringing you News, Movies, Music, Original Series & so much more! Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Dealers
programme.desc: Cole gets lucky when he finds a Russian space suit in an old box. But there’s a problem – the gloves are missing. To find the gloves he has to strike a deal with Larry which sees them take a trip through the desert. Meanwhile Torie hears how Coke and Pepsi joined the space race; and she meets former NASA astronaut Winston Scott who tells her about the struggles of keeping clean in zero-G. Duration: 3600

programme.title: Space Channel Movie- Solar System: Secrets of the Universe
programme.desc: Fascinating facts, images...and fun with Jordan as we travel through our solar system. Duration: 7200

programme.title: Space Channel Movies: The Crawling Eye (The Trollenberg Terror)
programme.desc: A series of decapitations on a Swiss mountainside appear to be connected to a mysterious radioactive cloud. Sisters Sarah & Anne Pilgrim are on their way to Geneva, when Anne feels drawn to the mysterious mountain. Duration: 7200
